item.title: A-Global Association of Asian Sports (GAISF)
item.description: The Asian Jump Rope Union (AJRU) has become the 10th Asian Federation to gain GAISF Observer status The decision was taken by the Global Association of Asian Sports Federations (GAISF) Council, which meting during SportAccord in Bangkok.
